about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Get to know my professional journey
about.name: Vitor Andrade
about.description: UI/UX Specialist with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and a Postgraduate degree in Software Engineering. I'm passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences for users, with focus and enthusiasm in AI and Machine Learning. Besides programming, I'm fascinated by video games and compete semi-professionally in various titles during my free time.

axk.title: Back-end Development Internship
axk.description: Development of robust APIs and scalable back-end systems for professional eSports platform. Implementation of modern architectures, performance optimization and database integration. Agile team collaboration under direct mentorship of CEO Gustavo Vargas, Senior Software Engineer with extensive experience in corporate systems.
achievements: Development of RESTful APIs with ASP.NET Core
Implementation of JWT authentication and authorization
SQL Server query optimization with 40% performance improvement
Creation of unit tests and integration with 85% coverage
Automated deployment with Azure DevOps and Docker

axk.title: AXK eSports
axk.subtitle: Competitive excellence developing elite talents in the global eSports scene
axk.description: AXK is a Brazilian eSports organization founded with the goal of competing at the highest levels of electronic games. Our mission is to develop exceptional talents and represent Brazil in the global competitive scene with technical and strategic excellence.

ceo.title: CEO: Gustavo Vargas
ceo.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer and Brazilian eSports visionary
ceo.description: Technical leader with extensive experience in corporate systems development and passion for the competitive gaming scene. Gustavo combines technical expertise with strategic vision to position AXK as a national reference in professional eSports.

games.subtitle: We compete in the main titles of the global scene
games.description: Our team competes in the most relevant games in global eSports, always seeking technical excellence and significant results.

portfolio.title: My Projects

introduction.title: About my projects
introduction.description: This portfolio was created with great dedication for personal presentation, but also to showcase my technical skills and projects in a structured and interactive way. In addition to telling a bit about myself, it also shows what I'm capable of creating with code. It's divided into its respective sections, each highlighting technologies used and challenges faced. Feel free to explore and learn more about my work. If you have any questions, the contact section will be at your disposal!
